caption.p: Left panel: Temperature evolution of the potential energy of three nanoplates (upper plots), and the geometric parameters obtained by fitting the middle layer of the (001) nanoplate (lower plots); Right panel: a, b, c Snapshots of three nanoplates after relaxation. d, e, f Snapshots of the middle layer in the (001) nanoplate taken at representative temperatures. Cyan surfaces denote the corresponding fitting results
